ctu_text:
The coverage also includes an add-on benefit of scholarship to the children of the insured in case of the death of the insured.
To claim the insurance coverage, the nominee of the insured person needs to submit a claim form to the LIC branch office or any other authorized office within 30 days of the occurrence of the incident. The claim is then processed by the respective state government and the payment is made to the nominee's bank account. Overall, the Aam Aadmi Bima Yojana is an important initiative of the Indian government to provide social security to the unorganized sector of the population.
